text:
Kiva | San Francisco, CA | Full Time | on-site | http://www.kiva.org

Kiva changes the world through connecting lenders to borrowers to alleviate poverty. Come join our Technical Operations team in helping move us to AWS [1]. Also we'll be opening a front-end position soon, connect with me if that interests you!

[1] https://boards.greenhouse.io/kivaorg/jobs/273147?gh_jid=2731...
